channel.title: Posts on LY - A Hobbyist | Medical Student
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on LY - A Hobbyist | Medical Student

item.title: How to survive Medical School?
item.description: Studying Medicine is indeed tough, even for straight A’s students. Once you’ve entered a medical school, your previous “amazing” grades doesn’t mean shit at all. I am pretty sure you’ve realised that by now, after reading this. Everyone who’ve entered medical school are clever, but are they a great learner or teacher?

item.title: Part 2: Medicine programme in-depth
item.description:
This is part 2 of the post regarding the medicine programme that is available in Universiti Brunei Darusalam. All these information are correct. They are based on author experience and are also gathered from the main website.

This post will be updated if the contents are outdated. Please do contact the author if there are any mistake or problem in the post.

item.title: Part 1: Medicine programme in UBD, Brunei Darussalam?
item.description:
This is part 1 of the post regarding the medicine programme that is available in Universiti Brunei Darusalam. All these information are correct. They are based on author experience and are also gathered from the main website.

This post will be updated if the contents are outdated. Please do contact the author if there are any mistake or problem in the post.

item.title: WIP3: All heroes added and new card design!
item.description: I’ve finally graduated from university! Time to use my spare time developing this game. Onwards to the new update, i’ve finally added all the heroes from DOTA 2 with all the required stats. It’s now in a playable state but it still require some serious work on the stats. Beside that, i’ve made a new design to the card and created a website specifically for “DOTA2-CCG”, which can also be accessed from the sidebar menu.

item.title: WIP2: Slow development progress
item.description: This update is just to update you guys that i am still working on the game but lately the progress has been really slow as i have exam starting 1st May.

item.title: WIP1: Dota 2 Collectible Card Game
item.description: A simple free CCG using Unreal Engine that has the same ruleset as Hearthstone so that the game will be easy for newbies to pickup.
